articles.title: Ultra-fast deep-learned CNS tumour classification during surgery - Nature.com
articles.description: Sturgeon is a pretrained neural network that uses incremental results from nanopore sequencing to rapidly classify central nervous system tumours and can be used to aid critical decision-making during surgery.
